description: Coefficients in expansion of Euler's constant gamma as Sum a(n)/(n*n!*(n+1)!), n=1..inf, as found by greedy algorithm.
prog: (Macsyma) Ouang(x,n) := block([ ans : [ ] ], for k through n do (push(floor(multthru(k!*k*(k+1)!,x)),ans), x: x-ans[ 1 ]/(k!*k*(k+1)!)),reverse(ans)); Ouang(%gamma,25);
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Bill Gosper_
